en.label: Teragonian Calendar
en.description: Standard Teragona calendar with 12 months and leap years

months.name: Janwain
months.description: The coldest month of winter in the northern hemisphere

months.name: Febnínui
months.description: The shortest month, known for love and renewal

months.name: Mareron
months.description: Spring begins, named after Mars, god of war

months.name: Apririth
months.description: Month of opening buds and fresh growth

months.name: Maythron
months.description: Month of flowers, named after Maia, goddess of growth

months.name: Junorui
months.description: Beginning of summer, named after Juno, goddess of marriage

months.name: Julveth
months.description: Named after Julius Caesar, peak of summer

months.name: Augurui
months.description: Named after Augustus Caesar, late summer heat

months.name: Sepanneth
months.description: The seventh month of the old Roman calendar

months.name: Octbeleth
months.description: The eighth month of the old Roman calendar, autumn arrives

months.name: Novithui
months.description: The ninth month of the old Roman calendar, late autumn

months.name: Decithron
months.description: The tenth month of the old Roman calendar, winter solstice

weekdays.name: Sunsol
weekdays.description: Day of rest and worship in many cultures

weekdays.name: Tueyr
weekdays.description: Named after Tyr, Norse god of war

weekdays.name: Woden
weekdays.description: Named after Woden (Odin), chief Norse god

weekdays.name: Thunor
weekdays.description: Named after Thor, Norse god of thunder

weekdays.name: Frige
weekdays.description: Named after Frigg, Norse goddess of love

weekdays.name: Satdel
weekdays.description: Named after Saturn, Roman god of agriculture

seasons.name: Winter
seasons.description: The cold season when days are short and temperatures are low.

seasons.name: Stirring
seasons.description: The season of renewal when plants begin to grow and temperatures warm.

seasons.name: Spring
seasons.description: The season of renewal when plants begin to grow and temperatures warm.

seasons.name: Summer
seasons.description: The warmest season with long days and high temperatures.

seasons.name: Autumn
seasons.description: The harvest season when leaves change color and temperatures begin to cool.

seasons.name: Fading
seasons.description: The season where things slow down and days get shorter..
